spec_data.Name: sugar-physics
spec_data.Description:
You can add squares, circles, triangles, or draw your own shapes in
the Physics Activity, and see them come to life with forces (like gravity),
friction, and inertia.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Tue 17 Oct 2017 01:58:15 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: A physical world simulator and playground for Sugar
